mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into shop_activities(id,type_id,start_time,end_time,business_id,article_id) values(#{id},#{typeId},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{businessId},#{articleId})
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_activities set id=#{id} , type_id=#{typeId}, start_time=#{startTime}, end_time=#{endTime}, business_id=#{businessId}, article_id=#{articleId} where id =#{id}
mapper.select:

from shop_activities s INNER JOIN type t ON s.type_id=t.id INNER JOIN
business b ON s.business_id = b.id INNER JOIN article a ON s.type_id =a.id
